text: Mufise iki ko mutarwanira munzira y’Imana na bamwe batishoboye mubagabo hamwe n’abagore hamwe n’ibibondo bavuga bati:- Muremyi wacu, dukure muri iki gisagara abantu baho ari aba hemukiye imitima yabo, kandi uduhezagire kugira ngo tube dufise uwudukingira avuye kuri wewe, kandi uduhezagire tube n’uwuturokora avuye iwawe
